verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Noah,<WH5146> "Come<WH935> with all of your household<WH1004> into the ship,<WH8392> for I have seen<WH7200> your righteousness<WH6662> before me<WH6440> in this<WH2088> generation.<WH1755>

You shall take<WH3947> seven pairs of every clean<WH2889> animal<WH929> with you,<WH376> the male and his female.<WH802> Of the animals<WH929> that are not clean,<WH2889> take two,<WH8147> the male<WH376> and his female.<WH802>
Also of the birds<WH5775> of the sky,<WH8064> seven<WH7651> and seven,<WH2145> male and female,<WH5347> to keep<WH2421> seed<WH2233> alive<WH2421> on the surface<WH6440> of all the earth.<WH776>

In<WH5750> seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> I will cause it to rain<WH4305> on the earth<WH776> for forty<WH705> days<WH3117> and forty<WH705> nights.<WH3915> Every<WH3605> living thing<WH3351> that I have made,<WH6213> I will destroy<WH4229> from the surface of the ground.<WH6440>"
Noah<WH5146> did<WH6213> everything that Yahweh<WH3068> commanded him.<WH6680>
Noah<WH5146> was six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> when the flood<WH3999> of waters<WH4325> came on the earth.<WH776>
Noah<WH5146> went into the ship<WH8392> with his sons,<WH1121> his wife,<WH802> and his sons<WH1121>' wives,<WH802> because of<WH6440> the waters<WH4325> of<WH6440> the flood.<WH3999>
Clean<WH2889> animals,<WH2889> animals that are not clean, birds,<WH5775> and everything that creeps<WH7430> on the ground<WH127>
went<WH935> by<WH8147> pairs<WH8147> to Noah<WH5146> into the ship,<WH8392> male<WH2145> and female,<WH5347> as<WH834> God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> Noah.<WH5146>
It happened after the seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> that the waters<WH4325> of the flood<WH3999> came on the earth.<WH776>

In<WH8141> the six<WH8337> hundredth<WH3967> year<WH8141> of Noah<WH5146>'s life,<WH2416> in the second<WH8145> month,<WH2320> on the seventeenth<WH7651> day<WH3117> of the month,<WH2320> on the same<WH2088> day<WH3117> all the fountains<WH4599> of the great<WH7227> deep<WH8415> were burst open,<WH1234> and the sky<WH8064>'s windows<WH699> were opened.<WH6605>
The rain<WH1653> was on the earth<WH776> forty<WH705> days<WH3117> and forty<WH705> nights.<WH3915>

In the same<WH6106> day<WH3117> Noah,<WH5146> and Shem,<WH8035> Ham,<WH2526> and Japheth,<WH3315> the sons<WH1121> of Noah,<WH5146> and Noah<WH5146>'s wife,<WH802> and the three<WH7969> wives<WH802> of his sons<WH1121> with them,<WH8392> entered into the ship;

they,<WH1992> and every animal<WH2416> after its kind,<WH4327> all the livestock<WH929> after their kind,<WH4327> every creeping thing<WH7431> that creeps<WH7430> on the earth<WH776> after its kind,<WH4327> and every bird<WH5775> after its kind,<WH4327> every bird<WH6833> of every sort.<WH3671>
They went to Noah<WH5146> into<WH935> the ship,<WH8392> by<WH8147> pairs<WH8147> of all flesh<WH1320> with<WH834> the breath<WH7307> of life in them.<WH2416>
Those who went in,<WH935> went in<WH935> male<WH2145> and female<WH5347> of all flesh,<WH1320> as God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> him;<WH3068> and Yahweh shut him in.<WH5462>
The flood<WH3999> was forty<WH705> days<WH3117> on the earth.<WH776> The waters<WH4325> increased,<WH7235> and lifted up<WH5375> the ship,<WH8392> and it was lifted up<WH7311> above the earth.<WH776>
The waters<WH4325> prevailed,<WH1396> and increased<WH7235> greatly<WH3966> on the earth;<WH776> and the ship floated<WH3212> on the surface<WH6440> of the waters.<WH4325>
The waters<WH4325> prevailed<WH1396> exceedingly<WH3966> on the earth.<WH776> All the high<WH1364> mountains<WH2022> that were under<WH8478> the whole sky<WH8064> were covered.<WH3680>
The waters<WH4325> prevailed fifteen<WH6240> cubits<WH520> upward,<WH4605> and the mountains<WH2022> were covered.<WH3680>

All flesh<WH1320> died<WH1478> that moved<WH7430> on the earth,<WH776> including birds,<WH5775> livestock,<WH929> animals,<WH2416> every creeping thing<WH8318> that creeps<WH8317> on the earth,<WH776> and every man.<WH120>
All in whose nostrils<WH639> was the breath<WH5397> of the spirit of life,<WH2416> of all that was on the dry<WH2724> land,<WH4191> died.

Every living thing<WH3351> was destroyed<WH4229> that was on the surface<WH6440> of the ground,<WH127> including man,<WH120> livestock,<WH929> creeping things,<WH7431> and birds<WH5775> of the sky.<WH8064> They were destroyed<WH4229> from the earth.<WH776> Only<WH389> Noah<WH5146> was left,<WH7604> and those who<WH834> were with him in the ship.<WH8392>
The waters<WH4325> prevailed<WH1396> on the earth<WH776> one hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> days.<WH3117>
